name: Start Connector
tagline: First site of kinect, we have made a game of football using kinect skeleton recogonization
body:
StartConnector GitHub Pages
===========================

- About
This is a kinect game on Windows based .NET4.0.
The game is prepared for football lover who can not enjoying the role
of goal-keeper while in room. You could control your body to catch 
the balls generated from different directions. Or you can use keyboard
to control the player.

- Download
If you have a Kinect for Windows, you could download it from this url
address [DOWNLOAD_STARTCONNECTOR](http://pan.baidu.com/s/1kTLrsnd)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
